name: pwel

stmt.pretty: elpwd(P(c0), P(⋃ c1), universe, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cpw(cuni(c1)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cpw(cuni(c1)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cpw(cuni(c1)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

stmt.origin: sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
stmt.pretty: sylib(c0 ∈ c1, P(c0)⊆ P(⋃ c1), c0 ⊆ ⋃ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
-| wb(wss(c0, cuni(c1)), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cpw(cuni(c1)))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
-| wb(wss(c0, cuni(c1)), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), cpw(cpw(cuni(c1)))))
-| wb(wss(c0, cuni(c1)), wss(cpw(c0), cpw(cuni(c1))))

comment: Membership of a power class. Exercise 10 of [Enderton] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2007.)
